short_summary: Replace Walker Bridge over Frenchman River.
description: The Canadian government, represented by Parks Canada, is seeking a contractor to replace the Walker Bridge over the Frenchman River, located in Grasslands National Park, Saskatchewan. The project aims to replace the existing timber bridge with a new concrete and steel short-span bridge, maintaining an existing temporary detour. The work involves re-alignment of the gravel grid road to the new bridge, demolition and environmentally friendly disposal of the existing timber bridge and road access, and site restoration. \n
duration_in_months: ;Inorder to complete the work by November 30, 2024.,
full_summary:
**Stage 2 - Walker Bridge Replacement, Grasslands National Park**
===========================================================

### Bid Solicitation Details

- **Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0257/B
- **Closing Date and Time:** 1st May 2024 @ 16:00 hours
- **Location:** Saskatchewan Province, Canada

### Contract Overview

Parks Canada invites bids for the replacement of the Walker Bridge located in Grasslands National Park, Saskatchewan. The scope of work includes:

- Replacement of the bridge with a new concrete and steel short-span bridge
- Re-alignment of the existing gravel grid road to the new bridge
- Demolition and environmentally friendly disposal of the existing timber bridge and road access
- Site restoration

### Environmental Considerations

- The project site is critical habitat for multi-species at risk
- Local authorities have imposed an emergency protection order for Sage Grouse in this area
- Mitigation measures will be implemented to minimize environmental and archaeological impacts

### Dates and Timeline

- Site availability: 15th July 2024
- Contract commencement: 8th May 2024
- Project completion: 30th November 2024

### Selection Process

This is Stage 2 of a two-stage solicitation process:

- First stage: Suppliers were evaluated on their qualifications
- Second stage: Invited qualified suppliers to bid on the project based on the specification and drawings

### Bidder Requirements

- Must submit a financial bid based on the project specifications and drawings
- Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid

### Contact person

- Ken Lacanilao
- kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca
- 587 832 1894

### Notice URL and Attachment

This notice and attached documents may be downloaded from the Government of Canada's Bid Solicitation website. 

Note:
It is not recommended to bid on this project if you haven't read and understood the Government of Canada's open government contract terms.
Also, thoroughly review the Environmental and Trade Agreements sections before bidding.
You may review the “End User Entities Name“ and “End User Entities Address“ section in technical annex (see attached files) for further reference, if any.
